title: CZ denies he’s behind a proposal for a crypto private bank in Kyrgyzstan
contentSnippet: Kyrgyzstan President Sadyr Japarov claims that Changpeng “CZ” Zhao proposed establishing a private bank that also deals in cryptocurrency.

title: French MPs advance measure to tax crypto as ‘unproductive wealth’
contentSnippet: Lawmakers in France’s National Assembly have passed an amendment that would consider larger crypto holdings “unproductive wealth” and subject them to taxation.

title: Tokenization takes prime role in Hong Kong’s Fintech 2030 strategy
contentSnippet: The Hong Kong Monetary Authority has outlined its real-world asset tokenization plans, including tokenized bonds and stablecoin integration for blockchain settlements.

title: Trump Downplays Knowledge of Binance Chief After Pardon Linked to Family's Crypto Dealings
contentSnippet: In a rare interview, Trump said he was told Changpeng Zhao was the victim of the Biden administration's “witch hunt” against crypto.

title: Denmark finally giving up on EU Chat Control after privacy backlash
contentSnippet: Privacy-concerned citizens are celebrating as Denmark withdraws its proposal for the mandatory scanning of messages on platforms like Telegram, Signal and WhatsApp.

title: Why Did Fed Inject $29.4B in Liquidity And What Does it Mean For Bitcoin?
contentSnippet: While the move helps avoid potential liquidity crises that could damage financial markets, it falls short of being as stimulative to risk assets as the Fed's other moves, such as QE.

title: Dogecoin, Cardano Lead Selloff on Profit-Taking, Gold Pulls Back as China Ends Tax Rebate
contentSnippet: Meanwhile, bitcoin selling by long-term investors has tripled since June, as buyers who entered near $93,000 take profits.

title: 欧州が仮想通貨・証券の統一監督機関設立を検討　米SECモデルに
contentSnippet: 欧州委員会が仮想通貨・証券取引所を一元監督する機関を構想している。米証券取引委員会をモデルにしており、ESMAの権限拡大案も検討していると伝えられる。

title: FTX債権者は仮想通貨上昇分の恩恵受けられずか　債権実質回収率の試算は9%～46%
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨取引所FTXの債権者は破綻時の現金相当額で弁済されるため、債権者はビットコインなどの上昇分を受け取れないことになる。債権者代表は、実質回収率は9～46%と推算した。

title: DOGE Falls to $0.18 as Long-Term Holders Exit, 'Death Cross' Price Action Appears
contentSnippet: The decline came amid a deteriorating technical backdrop and increased selling activity across large wallets.

title: XRP Chart Turns Neutral, Repeated $2.55 Rejections Define Next Breakout Zone
contentSnippet: Traders are closely monitoring the $2.49 support level, as sustained closes below could lead to further declines.

title: Crypto Prices Slip Ahead of US Jobs Data as Bessent Flags Rate Risks
contentSnippet: Crypto slipped in thin weekend trade as investors prepared for U.S. jobs data and weighed comments from Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent.

title: ’Sunk-cost-maxxing’ is killing long-term crypto development
contentSnippet: Shrinking product cycles and constant pivoting mean nobody in crypto stays with anything long enough to know if it works, argues Ten Protocol’s Rosie Sargsian.

title: Elizabeth Warren rebuffs CZ defamation threat as ‘without merit’
contentSnippet: Changpeng Zhao’s lawyer, Teresa Goody Guillén, reportedly threatened to sue Warren for “defamatory statements” on X after CZ secured a pardon from Trump.

title: South Australia Rounds Up Another 55 Suspects After High Court Backs Encrypted-App Sting
contentSnippet: Authorities moved to the third phase of Operation Ironside, using AN0M intelligence to expand drug, weapons and laundering cases.

title: Aster token goes flying after CZ reveals $2.5M personal stake
contentSnippet: Aster pumped after Binance co-founder Changpeng Zhao shared a screenshot showing that he holds over 2 million Aster tokens.

title: Asia Morning Briefing: Cautious Calm Returns to BTC Markets as Traders Rebuild Risk
contentSnippet: BTC holds near $110K and Ethereum trades around $3,900 as liquidations ease and market makers report clients slowly re-entering risk after the Fed-driven selloff.

title: 仮想通貨Zcash、プライバシー取引機能をさらに強化へ　新ロードマップ公開
contentSnippet: 匿名機能を重視する仮想通貨Zcashが2025年10～12月期のロードマップを発表した。プライバシー機能を大幅強化し、スワップ毎の使い捨てアドレスなどを導入する計画だ。

title: Sui DEX「Momentum」、11月上旬にTGE予定　累積取引量250億ドル超でエコシステム基盤化
contentSnippet: Sui最大のDEX「Momentum」、210万人のユーザーを獲得。投票型ガバナンスで投票者自身が報酬配分を決定し、プールの手数料を得る仕組みで流動性の安定化を目指す。

title: JPYCの買い方・使い方まとめ｜何ができる？今後の活用法・注意点を徹底解説
contentSnippet: JPYCが資金移動業ライセンスを取得し、日本初の円建てステーブルコイン「JPYC EX」を発行へ。特徴や将来性を徹底解説。

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: EU mulls SEC-like oversight for stock, crypto exchanges to bolster startup landscape
contentSnippet: The EU is reportedly drafting a proposal to transfer crypto and financial sector oversight to the ESMA, as part of a wider push to improve capital markets for startups.

title: The Biggest Games Releasing in November 2025
contentSnippet: It's a big month for gaming, thanks to the impending release of Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, Kirby Air Riders, and a new Zelda game on Switch 2.

title: The Complete Idiot's Guide to MCP: Giving Your AI Web Superpowers
contentSnippet: Tired of feeding data to OpenAI, Google, or Anthropic? A few open-source tools and the Model Context Protocol let you give any lightweight model real-time browsing powers.

title: What Is Tempo? The Payments and Stablecoin Blockchain Built by Stripe
contentSnippet: Payments giant Stripe is helping build Tempo, a layer-1 blockchain focused on payments and stablecoins. Here's what you need to know.

title: Bitcoin ‘money vessel’ amasses $8B but recovery lacks ETF inflows
contentSnippet: Despite an $8 billion rise in realized cap, Bitcoin’s recovery lacks the continued inflows from ETFs and Michael Saylor’s Strategy as the main demand drivers, according to CryptoQuant.

title: Quantum Threat to Bitcoin: How Panic Could Break Crypto Before Physics Does
contentSnippet: Experts say the real danger to Bitcoin isn’t quantum machines—it’s human panic and slow preparation.

title: ASTER Zooms 20% as Binance's CZ Purchases 2M Tokens
contentSnippet: ASTER is a rebranded derivative platform token with a max supply of 8 billion, focusing on community incentives and decentralized exchange features.

title: The AWS Outage Shows Why Crypto Can't Keep Relying On Centralized Infrastructure
contentSnippet: For an industry that prides itself on decentralization and constantly lauds its benefits, crypto exchanges being so reliant on vulnerable centralized cloud platforms for their own infrastructure feels

title: 'Bitcoin's Silent IPO': Analyst Addresses BTC's Lame Price Action in Viral Weekend Essay
contentSnippet: Wildly successful ETFs, accelerating institutional adoption and friendly regulatory policy, yet bitcoin watches from the sidelines as other assets surge. What gives?

title: Sam Bankman-Fried's Last Chance? Appeals Court to Hear Arguments on FTX Founder's Retrial Motion Next Week
contentSnippet: The FTX founder is looking for a fresh trial on his fraud and conspiracy charges. He's got an uphill battle.

title: November Could Be the New October for U.S. Crypto ETFs After Shutdown Delays SEC Decisions
contentSnippet: After October’s delays caused by the U.S. government shutdown, ETF issuers are finding new ways to bring spot crypto funds to market.

title: 今週の主要仮想通貨材料まとめ、フランスのビットコイン戦略的備蓄法案提出やソラナETFの米上場など
contentSnippet: 前週比で振り返る仮想通貨市場の最新動向。ビットコインやイーサリアム、XRP、ソラナといった主要銘柄の騰落率や注目材料を一挙紹介。市場トレンドと関連ニュースを詳しく解説する。

title: メタマスクの使い方、仮想通貨の送金や交換：スワップ、便利機能を図解でわかりやすく
contentSnippet: MetaMaskのインストール方法から送金手順、暗号資産（仮想通貨）取引所への送金や取引所からの出庫方法、セキュリティ対策までを初心者向けに詳しく解説。自己管理型ウォレットの基本知識を身に付けましょう。

title: ビットコインは売られ過ぎ水準、来週の指標次第で利下げ期待強まるか｜bitbankアナリスト寄稿
contentSnippet: ビットコインは逆三尊形成中でギリギリの水準。来週のISM統計で景気減速が確認されれば12月利下げ期待が強まり、11.6万ドルのネックライン到達も。今後の展望を解説。

title: 週刊仮想通貨ニュース｜Bybitの日本人新規登録停止や日本初のステーブルコインJPYC始動に高い関心
contentSnippet: 今週は、日本初のステーブルコインJPYC始動、SBIインシュアランスグループによる株主優待へのXRP導入、仮想通貨取引所Bybitによる日本人の新規登録停止に関する記事が関心を集めた。

title: Criminal Crypto Use Is Becoming 'Increasingly Sophisticated', Says Europol
contentSnippet: EU law enforcement has pledged deeper cooperation and investment as criminals refine blockchain abuse tactics.

title: Public Keys: Coinbase Cashes In, IBIT Slips, and REX Spins Volatility Into Gold
contentSnippet: Coinbase soars past Q3 targets while Bitcoin ETFs face turbulence—plus a new fund betting on crypto stock volatility for income.

title: Romanian Regulator Blacklists Polymarket as 'Gambling That Must Be Licensed'
contentSnippet: The Romanian National Office for Gambling said that it would "not allow the transformation of blockchain into a screen for illegal betting."

title: ステーブルコイン覇権争い激化　テザーが過去最高益、USDCは機関投資家採用加速
contentSnippet: ステーブルコイン最大手テザーが2025年第3四半期報告書を公表し年初来利益が100億ドルを超えたことを明らかにした。米国債保有額は1350億ドルに達し国別ランキング17位相当。
